name: Dr. Eleanor Whitmore
profession: Comparative Literature Professor specializing in 19th Century British and Chinese Literature
personalityAndHobbies: Dr. Whitmore is a meticulous and introspective scholar with a dry wit. Her office is famously cluttered with first editions and porcelain teacups from her travels.
